name: Selman Dedeakayoğulları
title: Jr. AI Engineer
profile: Known for combining technical expertise with a positive and engaging team spirit, I work in the field of artificial intelligence and software development, particularly focusing on large language models (LLMs) and computer vision. I enjoy generating original ideas and implementing them in the most practical and effective way. I believe that collaboration amplifies success, and I always strive to elevate both performance and team morale in every project I contribute to.

education.description: Studied AI-focused courses in an international setting. Voluntarily attended a Master’s level Computer Vision course alongside MSc students to deepen technical knowledge.

education.gpa: Transferred after first year with GPA 3.43

experience.title: AI Engineer Intern
experience.description: Developed and maintained chatbots for enterprise clients in Turkey and abroad using Druid AI. Delivered PoCs and provided ongoing support. Built LLM-based solutions using LLaMA, GPT-4, GPT-4o, and GPT-4 Vision.

experience.title: Software Engineering Intern
experience.description: Contributed to backend development for various internal modules. Gained experience in large-scale systems. Left early due to Erasmus study abroad program.

experience.title: Computer Vision Intern
experience.description: Built classification and segmentation models using PyTorch and TensorFlow. Worked with diverse architectures including ResNet, U-Net, MobileNet, EfficientNet, and VGG.

projects.name: Agentic Portfolio Chatbot
projects.technology: Agentic AI, Gemini API, RAG (Retrieval Augmented Generation)
projects.description: Developed an AI-powered portfolio chatbot using Google Gemini and Streamlit, which is fully functional in my portfolio website live. The system answers questions about my background, projects, and skills, and allows direct contact via secure email. Integrated a recruiter tool that analyzes any job description and reports my compatibility percentage, highlighting matched skills and experience.

projects.name: Social Media Analysis for Earthquake Victim Reports
projects.technology: Large Language Models (LLMs), NLP (Natural Language Processing), YOLO, Computer Vision
projects.description: Developed a multimodal AI system combining LLM-based information extraction from social media with drone-based visual verification. Achieved high accuracy in identifying urgent needs, locations, and structural damage to support real-time disaster response.

projects.name: Gendiary: New-Gen Social Media via Stable Diffusion
projects.technology: Stable Diffusion,Computer Vision, Prompt Engineering, API Development
projects.description: Developed an AI-powered diary app that generates personalized, context-aware images from user photos using Stable Diffusion and PyTorch, delivered via a Flask REST API with dynamic prompt management and GPU optimization.

projects.name: Image Captioning Project
projects.description: Fine tuned several VLM's and optimized the pipelines for an AI competition.

projects.name: Face Recognition Application
projects.description: MT-CNN based Face Recognition application. Also published an article about it on Medium account.

projects.name: Media Control with Gesture Recognition
projects.description: Machine Learning Course Term Project using MediaPipe and custom algorithms to detect different gestures.

projects.name: City Sounds Classification
projects.description: Global AI Hub Deep Learning Bootcamp Project. Sound spectrograms from UrbanSound8K dataset used for classification.

awards.name: TEKNOFEST T3 AI Hackathon 2024 Finalist
awards.description: Selected among 200+ teams to develop an LLM-based project within 48 hours at the T3 AI Hackathon.

awards.name: OBSS Code Master 2022
awards.description: Ranked 1st among university participants in an algorithm-based problem-solving competition.

awards.name: EESTech AI Solutions Challenge
awards.description: Created sentimental analysis solution in an hackathon within 4 hours. Achieved 2nd Place.

organizations.name: IEEE Computer Society Turkey Chapter
organizations.description: As the coordinator, I was responsible for the IEEE CS chairpersons of the universities in the Central Anatolia region.

references.name: Abdullatif BABA
references.title: Associate Professor
references.organization: Kuwait College of Science and Technology
